alert.note: Alert for Benton; Carroll; Madison; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 30 at 11:31PM CDT until July 31 at 12:15AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Benton County in northwestern Arkansas... Northern Madison County in northwestern Arkansas... Carroll County in northwestern Arkansas... Northeastern Washington County in northwestern Arkansas... * Until 1215 AM CDT. * At 1130 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Hollister to 6 miles northeast of Grandview to 7 miles northeast of Bella Vista, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations in or near the path include... Rogers... Berryville... Huntsville... Eureka Springs... Pea Ridge... Green Forest... Gateway... Beaver... Hindsville... Wesley... Carrollton... Rudd... Kingston... Forum... Hobbs State Park... Clifty... Withrow Springs State Park... War Eagle... Marble... Osage... THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
